notice.startUsingTitle: Start your Digital Standards Self Assessment
notice.startUsingDesc: Not sure what the Digital Standards assessment tool is? Continue [reading below](#welcomeNoticeTitle).
notice.takeTheSurveyDesc: Click [here](#/survey), or click “Survey” in the top menu bar to start the survey.
notice.calculateTeamResultsDesc: Click [here](#/teamSurveys), or click “Team results” in the top menu bar to start calulating team results.
notice.welcomeNoticeTitle: What is the Digital Standards Self-Assessment tool?
notice.section1p2: You can compare previous test results to current test results to see your personal growth over time.
notice.section1p4: You can calulate teams results and can evaluate the teams overall growth and success or compare to your teams previous test results.
notice.section2p1: You are not required to answer each section in a single visit, but we encourage teams to complete them all at least once to establish a full baseline.
notice.section2p3: Approx. 50 minutes to complete all 10 sections
notice.section3p2: Responses to the Digital Standards Self-Assessment are stored locally on your computer (browser's cache), and the Government of Canada does not save any information.
notice.welcomeNoticeBody:
The following tool is based on the Digital Standards playbook that was published in 2021. 

This tool will **support teams in the integration of the Digital Standards into their ways of working.** 

Teams are invited to complete the self-assesment every 6 (six) to 12 (twelve) months **to measure their progress**. However, you may use the tool at your discretion all year around as a team or individually.
notice.noProgress: The Digital Standards self-assessment has not yet started. Please choose a section to complete.

file.required: Please upload a survey data file
file.format: %{fileName} - This file is in the wrong format
file.differentFormat: The format of uploaded files are different

teamResults.title: Team Results Overview
